verses.roman:
māhitira bhaginī sei, nāma--mādhavī-devī
vṛddhā tapasvinī āra paramā vaiṣṇavī

synonyms: māhitira bhaginī—sister of Śikhi Māhiti; sei—that; nāma—named; mādhavī-devī—of the name Mādhavīdevī; vṛddhā—an elderly lady; tapasvinī—very strict in executing devotional service; āra—and; paramā vaiṣṇavī—a first-class devotee.
translation: Śikhi Māhiti's sister was named Mādhavīdevī. She was an elderly lady who always performed austerities. She was very advanced in devotional service.
